name: Soul V/S Ghost
description:
Kill the ghosts.

Why?

BECAUSE they killed you!!

I am a soul with no power! How will I take revenge?

Hover over a switch and click to turn on the light.

They may shoot water at you. Also, remember the controls.

Controls:

WASD and Arrow keys to move.

Space and "E" key to click.

Click Go after exterminating enough ghost.

The skeleton is not made by me. But converted from animated gif to image sequence and sequence of gif to png by me. That was a lot of work!
